title: The Yoga Barn - Bali Yoga Studio & Class Schedules, Ubud
cleaned_text: | | | | | | | | | | SPECIAL EVENTS Wednesday, September 13th: [Heart Opening Sound Bath a Yogic Perspective w/ DC (Shivananda)](/events#non-violent-communication-shivananda) September 23rd | October 7th & 21st: [Mala Workshop w/ Aum Rudraksha](/events#mala-making-workshop-aum) Tuesday, September 26th: Love: It's not you w/ Rick Smith](/events#unconditional-love-rick-smith) Monday, October 2nd: [Authentic Relating w/ Rick Smith BY DONATION](/events#workshop-authentic-relating) Friday & Saturday, October 6th & 7th: [2-Day Workshop Authentic Relating Level 1 - The ART of Being Human w/ Rick Smith](/events#workshop-authentic-relating-rick-smith) Monday, October 9th: [ Reiki Training Level 1 w/ Melani Koch ](/events#reiki-training-melani-october) October 10th: Course w/ Punnu Singh Wasu](/events#2-day-spiritual-awakening-course) Monday, December 4th: [ Reiki Training 1 w/ Melani Koch ](/events#reiki-training-melani-dec4) Barn Watsu Pool Every [FLOW STATE: Water Contact Dance Ocean Collective](/events#inner-ocean-flow-state) Friday: [Rest & Release w/ Inner Ocean Collective ](/events#rest-release-inner-ocean-collective) HEALTHY COOKING September 11th & 18th: [Conscious Cooking Class w/ Nina Ryckewaert](/events#conscious-cooking-class-nina-sept) 2023 TRAININGS (In person @ The Yoga Barn) September 10-30: [Sex, Death & Wealth 300h Yoga Training Judelle](/bali-yoga-teacher-training.html#embodied-flow-200hr-with-tara-judelle) October 2-22: [The Art & of - Hatha Yoga 200h Teacher Training w/ Tanya Kaps](/bali-yoga-teacher-training.html#art-science-transformation-Tanya) October 24 - November 4: [Yin Yang Yoga Training 100h w/ Paul Teodo](/bali-yoga-teacher-training.html#100-hour-yin-yang-training) October 25 - November Romero November 4-8: [Reiki Training w/ Reiki Grand Master Punnu Singh Wasu](/bali-yoga-teacher-training.html#reiki-training-punnu-november) November 11 - December 1: [Active Consciousness Meditation 50, 100 & 200hr Teacher Training w/ Punnu Singh Wasu](/bali-yoga-teacher-training.html#active-consciousness-meditation-teacher-training-nov) November 13-25: Teacher Training w/ Tina Nance ](/bali-yoga-teacher-training.html#Embodied-Feminine-Arts-Tina-Nance) November 22 - December 1: [Women ReWilding: A Yoga Training to Embody Cyclical Wisdom, Vitality & Freedom 100hr w/ Bex Tyrer ](/bali-yoga-teacher-training.html#women-rewilding-100hour-bex) December 6-15 : Teaching: Myth, Magic & Mastery 100h YACEP Teacher Training Course w/ Bex Tyrer](/bali-yoga-teacher-training.html#the-art-of-teaching-yoga-bex) West & Stringer](/bali-yoga-teacher-training.html#Kirtan-East-West-Academy) December 11-18: Yintelligence Training
